original_title: Lesbian Adventures: Older Women Younger Girls 2
overview: There's nothing sweeter than an older, more mature woman initiating a young and sweet girl into the sensual ways of lesbian romance. Sweetheart Video is back with a second volume of Lesbian Adventures: Older Women, Younger Girls. Combining some of the most gorgeous and famous milfs like Nina Hartley and Julia Ann with the freshest and hottest young starlets like Jessie Andrews and Dani Daniels, these four scenes are a testament to Sweetheart's commitment to real passion and sex in amazing quality. Written & directed by Dana Vespoli.
title: Lesbian Adventures: Older Women Younger Girls 2
